start.speaker: Pixel
start.text: Awesome! A platformer - the classic jump-and-run adventure! We'll build this scene by scene.
start.followUp: First up: your title screen to draw players in!

titleBackground.speaker: Pixel
titleBackground.text: Let's set the mood! Pick a background that shows off your platformer world.

titleCharacterPreview.speaker: Pixel
titleCharacterPreview.text: Now let's pick your hero! They'll bounce on the title screen to show off.

titleMusic.speaker: Pixel
titleMusic.text: Every platformer needs catchy title music! Pick something upbeat.

levelSelectScene.speaker: Pixel
levelSelectScene.text: Great title! Now for level selection - how should players pick their stage?

worldMapStyle.speaker: Pixel
worldMapStyle.text: Love it! A world map like classic Mario games. Pick your map background.

levelGridStyle.speaker: Pixel
levelGridStyle.text: Clean and simple! A grid of level icons. Let's move to gameplay.

gameplayMovement.speaker: Pixel
gameplayMovement.text: Time for the core gameplay! First - how should jumping feel?

options.text: A: Floaty Jump - Hold to jump higher
B: Realistic Jump - Fixed arc physics

gameplayPlatforms.speaker: Pixel
gameplayPlatforms.text: Platformers need... platforms! What kind should we add?

options.text: Moving platforms that patrol back and forth
Crumbling platforms that fall when touched

gameplayEnemies.speaker: Pixel
gameplayEnemies.text: Every platformer needs enemies to dodge or defeat! Pick your baddies.

gameplayPowerups.speaker: Pixel
gameplayPowerups.text: Power-ups make platformers fun! Choose what to collect.

gameplayCoins.speaker: Pixel
gameplayCoins.text: Coins or gems to collect! Pick your shiny treasures.

gameplaySounds.speaker: Pixel
gameplaySounds.text: Sound effects bring it to life! Jump sounds, coin dings, power-up jingles!

bossScene.speaker: Pixel
bossScene.text: Every world needs a boss fight! How should the boss behave?

options.text: Reactive - Boss adapts to player actions

bossMusic.speaker: Pixel
bossMusic.text: Boss battles need epic music! Something intense!

victoryScene.speaker: Pixel
victoryScene.text: Victory! How should we celebrate beating the level?

options.text: A: Score counts up with bonus multipliers
B: Instant score reveal with rankings

victoryAnimation.speaker: Pixel
victoryAnimation.text: Your hero needs a victory dance! Pick the celebration style.

victoryMusic.speaker: Pixel
victoryMusic.text: Victory fanfare time! Pick triumphant music!
